channel.title: How do I add compiler to FudgeScape Source?
channel.description:
[b]How do I add a compiler to FudgeScape Source? I need a clear anwser on this please. Steps of how to do it would be that best.
Thanks[/b]

item.title: How do I add compiler to FudgeScape Source?
item.dc:creator: @nklink nklink
item.description:
@nklink wrote:

I got a nice basic compiler…

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

It works perfectly =]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add compiler to FudgeScape Source?

item.title: How do I add compiler to FudgeScape Source?
item.dc:creator: @xBl1tzScapex xBl1tzScapex
item.description:
@xBl1tzScapex wrote:

Okay seeing your a first time poster I wont be TOO hard on you, but just copy one of your other compiler’s from your other sources to it, if you dont have one, gimmie a sec i’ll post one.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2008, 07:19:39 PM[/size][hr]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
Should work.
